dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') invoice_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmddth')) day_name, TRIM(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'MONTH')) month_name, TRIM(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'YYYY')) year_name, TRIM(con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name) involved_party FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT obrns1.ob_refnum_value party, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrns4.ob_refnum_value END) address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns8.ob_refnum_value END) city_state_zip, COALESCE(obr1.remark_text, (SELECT it.description FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1)) commodity FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns1.order_base_gid AND obrns1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns2.order_base_gid AND obrns2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns3.order_base_gid AND obrns3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns4.order_base_gid AND obrns4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns5.order_base_gid AND obrns5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns6.order_base_gid AND obrns6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns7.order_base_gid AND obrns7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrns8.order_base_gid AND obrns8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_COMMODITY DETAIL' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID UNION ALL SELECT '' party, '' address, '' city_state_zip, (SELECT it.description FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) commodity FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID)
